tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id
        FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
        REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
